Name: Alan's Apple Breeze
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
15 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Review: A sweet, tangy version of the Apple Breeze .
History: Created in 2002 by Alan Johnston at the Metropolitan in Glasgow, Scotland.
Nutrition: One serving of Alan's Apple Breeze contains 226 calories
